name: Pricing Confusion
summary: Customers find pricing tiers unclear and mismatched with value.

name: Onboarding Friction
summary: Users report that setup and onboarding take longer than expected.

name: Integration Gaps
summary: Lack of integrations with key CRMs (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce) is blocking adoption.

name: Reporting Limitations
summary: Analytics and export functionality are too limited for team workflows.

name: Positive Support Experience
summary: Many users praise customer support responsiveness.
